s.text: Although we have not given the alumni and donors at large the opportunity to participate in the giving of awards for students, we would like to this year as a special way for you to respond to Herron's 90th anniversary.
It's time for the annual Awards Ceremony.
Students appreciate gift certificates from art supply stores, lumberyards, paper firms, etc.
Their appreciation and enthusiasm for what they are doing will go a long way to thank you for your encouragement and support.
